question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the large-tooth sawfish?
1) The scientific name of large-tooth sawfish is Pristis pristis.
2) The IUCN status of the large-tooth sawfish is critically endangered.
3) They are endemic to northern Australia.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The scientific name of the large-tooth sawfish which is also called as common sawfish is Pristis pristis. The IUCN status of the large-tooth sawfish is critically endangered. They are endemic to northern Australia.
